0.1.1.name: wordpress/posts-map
0.1.1.description:
The plugins uses a short tag posts-map to add the grilled image, and you can add all the blog post icons using its rows and columns. The icons can be personalized with custom field map_icon.

Usage : [posts-map image='image_url' rows=10 cols=15 name='map_name' grid=1 gridcolor=#FF00FF ]Map Title[/posts-map]

where : 1. image : url to image fo map 2. rows : number of rows to slice the image 3. cols : number of columns to slice the image 4. name : name of maps (used to add more maps in your blog) 5. grid : width (in pixel) of map grid (no grid if don't use a option) 6. gridcolor : color for grid 7. Map Title : title writed on top of map

To put an icon into a map named 'map_name', insert two customfields 'location' and 'map_icon' to set the coordinates and the permalink of the icon.
